Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Mayfield
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Central, Jackson, Austin and Madison, due to street blockage near Madison/Mayfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Madison, Central, Jackson, Austin and Madison, due to street blockage near Madison/Mayfield.

Allow extra travel time.
